text:
AMC, Cinemark, Regal not requiring masks in theatres. 

AMC’s CEO: “We did not want to be drawn into a political controversy. We thought it might be counterproductive if we forced mask wearing on those people who believe strongly that it is not necessary." https://t.co/DjN85KIJIN
